```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}

images_columns <- c("y", "x","cloud_label","NDAI","SD","CORR","rad_DF","rad_CF",
                    "rad_BF","rad_AF","rad_AN" )
image1 <- read.delim("./image_data/image1.txt", sep="", col.names = images_columns)
image2 <- read.delim("./image_data/image2.txt", sep="", col.names = images_columns)
image3 <- read.delim("./image_data/image3.txt", sep="", col.names = images_columns)
```

```{r}
#image 1 beautiful map 
ggplot(image1)+
  geom_tile(aes(x=x, y=y, fill=cloud_label))+
  labs(fill= "Cloud?",
       title="Expert Labels")

ggplot(image2)+
  geom_tile(aes(x=x, y=y, fill=cloud_label))+
  labs(fill= "Cloud?",
       title="Expert Labels")

ggplot(image3)+
  geom_tile(aes(x=x, y=y, fill=cloud_label))+
  labs(fill= "Cloud?",
       title="Expert Labels")
```

```{r}
# quantitative pairwise relationship between features
summary1 <- cor(image1)
summary2 <- cor(image2)
summary3 <- cor(image3)
```

```{r}
# relationship between NDAI and expert labels
ggplot(image1, aes(x=NDAI, y=cloud_label)) + 
  geom_violin() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("NDAI and Expert Label on image1")

ggplot(image2, aes(x=NDAI, y=cloud_label)) + 
  geom_violin() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("NDAI and Expert Label on image2")

ggplot(image3, aes(x=NDAI, y=cloud_label)) + 
  geom_violin() + 
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("NDAI and Expert Label on image3")
```
```{r}
# relationship between CORR and expert labels
```
